original_text: The Lord your God lives among you. He wants you to belong to him alone. If you worship other gods, he will be very angry with you. He will completely destroy you from the whole earth.
korean_text: 너희 중에 계신 너희의 하나님 여호와는 질투하시는 하나님이신즉 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 진노하사 너를 지면에서 멸절시키실까 두려워하노라

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God lives among you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 당신의 하나님은 당신들 가운데 거하십니다

sentences.original_text: He wants you to belong to him alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 오직 그에게만 속하기를 원하십니다

sentences.original_text: he will be very angry with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신에게 매우 화가 날 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will completely destroy you from the whole earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신을 온 땅에서 완전히 멸망시킬 것입니다
